column4: Hi there, what program can I use for share via FTP a specific directory in my computer? with a ricght click of the mouse?
not sure ftp can work that way.   at least not with a simple right click/share....
it can if the app is thinked like that
what app? You mean if the ftp server is compiled that way? cant say that ive ever seen a ftp server add that feature to gnome.. then again.. FTP is  somthing i now avoid. I use ssh.
